carry_champions.name: Kassadin

level_6.playstyle: Play safe, farm, avoid extended trades

level_11.playstyle: Start looking for picks, roam more actively

level_16.description: Maximum Riftwalk damage and lowest cooldown
level_16.playstyle: Hypercarry mode, 1v9 potential in team fights

item_spikes.impact: Significant mana sustain and scaling base
Massive mana pool and ability power

win_conditions: Survive lane phase without falling too far behind
Force late game team fights around objectives

carry_champions.name: Draven

level_2.description: Blood Rush movement speed and attack speed
level_2.playstyle: All-in potential with support, first blood opportunity

level_6.playstyle: Look for kills across map, secure kills in lane

item_spikes.impact: Massive damage spike for trades and all-ins
Survivability and sustained damage in fights
Execute potential and lethality for squishies

win_conditions: Establish early lead through aggressive laning
Convert kills into map pressure and objectives
End game before late game carries come online

carry_champions.name: Fiora

level_1.description: Passive vital damage and movement speed
level_1.playstyle: Short trades focusing on vital procs

level_6.playstyle: Look for all-ins, establish lane control

item_spikes.impact: Sustain and waveclear for split pushing
Survivability for team fights and 1v2 potential

win_conditions: Win lane and deny enemy top laner
Split push pressure in side lanes
Draw multiple enemies to stop split push

carry_champions.name: Graves

level_3.description: Full clear potential with all abilities
level_3.playstyle: Fast clear, early ganks or invades

level_6.description: Collateral Damage for burst and mobility

level_11.description: Enhanced ultimate damage and lower cooldown
level_11.playstyle: Team fight damage dealer, objective control

item_spikes.impact: Massive damage spike for dueling and ganks
Tank busting capability for team fights

win_conditions: Control enemy jungle and deny vision
Secure mid game objectives with burst damage
Create picks with mobility and burst

carry_champions.name: Jinx

level_6.playstyle: Focus on farming, use R for assists

level_13.description: Max rank Fishbones for team fight DPS
level_13.playstyle: Primary damage dealer in team fights

item_spikes.impact: Major DPS increase against all targets
Team fight AoE damage and Get Excited resets
Massive crit damage for hypercarry status

win_conditions: Survive lane phase and farm safely
Get resets with Get Excited passive

early_game_meta.win_conditions: Establish leads, take early objectives, end by 25 minutes

mid_game_meta.win_conditions: Control objectives, team fight around power spikes

late_game_meta.win_conditions: Scale safely, win team fights, control Baron/Elder

engage_composition.strategy: Force team fights with massive engage, follow up with AoE damage

poke_composition.strategy: Siege objectives, poke before fights, disengage when engaged upon

split_push_composition.strategy: Fiora splits, team groups and threatens objectives 4v4
